name: Lords & Chaos: The Unknown Invaders
description:
Lords & Chaos: The Unknown Invaders is  a Single Player Fantasy-Strategy Game. 

The Game Features Some Ordinary Inspired /Related Content of  Dynasty/ROTK And LOTR .

The Game Has 2 Main Features :

- (Scenarios Mode) Which Includes 3 Scenarios,  Each Scenario Contains 7 Stages. 

- In (Wave Mode) You'll Experiment,  The Immersiveness,  And Deciding/Controlling The Battle Flow.
